title: Invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
body:
Hi people, I've been working on this project for a few days now. I have managed to synchronize the node, and connect from curl. It has been impossible from web3.
Now I'm getting this error when starting the node.

System information

Erigon 2.51.0

OS & Version: Linux

Command:

```./build/bin/erigon --chain=mumbai --bor.heimdall=https://heimdall-api-testnet.polygon.technology --bor.milestone=true --http=true --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.port=8545 --http.compression=true --http.vhosts=* --http.corsdomain=* --ws=true --ws.compression=true --http.api=eth,net,trace,web3,erigon --torrent.download.rate=512mb --torrent.upload.rate=512mb```
